thread.title: Allegiant Air adds Memphis to roster of destinations from St. Pete-Clearwater
thread.title_full: Allegiant Air adds Memphis to roster of destinations from St. Pete-Clearwater

author: Eric Snider
title: Allegiant Air adds Memphis to roster of destinations from St. Pete-Clearwater
text:
Enlarge Allegiant Air Despite a recent spate of bad PR, including emergency landings , abruptly canceled flights and passengers stuck on tarmacs, Allegiant Air continues to expand its routes in and out of St. Pete-Clearwater International Airport (PIE). The low-fare carrier announced Tuesday that it has added twice-weekly, nonstop service between PIE and Memphis International Airport starting on October 1. Allegiant is also engaged in a labor dispute with its pilots , who have twice attempted to strike but have been enjoined from doing so by a federal judge in Las Vegas, where the airline is based. The addition of Memphis brings the number of cities that Allegiant services from PIE to 44. The airline accounts for roughly 95 percent of the passenger traffic at the airport.
